name: Tennis Score Predictor
description:
What is this? It is a score predictor based on the serve stats you enter for each player (serving and receiving) the game’s algorithm will return the most likely points, games and sets results.

Once you start the game, you will be presented with two game modes:

Manual: Enter the players’ stats and first player to serve. Click every time it is a player’s turn to serve.

Auto: Enter the players’ stats, sets to play (1 to 5), choose slow or fast auto speed, and first player to serve. The game will play automatically.

Statistics: Six different screens displaying all the game stats
